description: This is a description of a great section of the Bruce Trail near Milton.  the area is littered by huge limestone blocks that form labyrinth like structure.  Cave, crevasses, pinching points are just about everywhere.  You just need to follow the Bruce trail uphill for a few hundred metres and then you are in a massive section of jumbled limestone just begging to be explored
directions: Highway 401.  Exit to Guelph line.  turn right on Campbellville Rd and then left on Twiss Rd.  Park at approx 43.448173, -79.954034.  Follow the Bruce Trail...
title: Twiss Rd Limestone
